624850.name: RPG Maker MV - Karugamo Contemporary BGM Pack 02
624850.description:
From Pokemon to Final Fantasy, many of our favorite jRPGs bring the modern setting to the players. But is your game music library equipped with modern songs?

Karugamo Contemporary BGM Pack 02 is a companion to the Karugamo Fantasy line, with some added modern flair. From natural to the supernatural, Contemporary pack 2 features a variety of themes to fit your mood. Inspired by j-pop and anime, this quirky pack includes a variety of unusual and quirky themes - merging melody with dissonance for a truly unique experience.

This pack contains:
  • 25 BGM themes.
  • Instruments and composition styles you would find in many JRPGs or Japanese Anime.
  • .m4a and .ogg formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects.
  • BONUS: 2 walking character sprites based on the cover art (in MV RTP-style)!

Sample (SoundCloud)
624850.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
